title: Trump signs bill demanding his administration release the Epstein files
content: The legislation compels Atty. Gen. Pam Bondi to make available "all unclassified records, documents, communications and investigative materials" in the Epstein files within 30 days.

title: Could Trump destroy the Epstein files?
content: Bipartisan fervor has grown over the Epstein files, with House lawmakers across party lines expected to unite behind a bill on Tuesday that would compel the release of the documents.

title: Congress votes to release Epstein files after Trump reverses course
content: The House and Senate voted overwhelmingly to demand the release of all Justice Department records related to the investigation of late financier Jeffrey Epstein.

title: Trickle of revelations fuels scandal over Trump's ties to Epstein
content: The emails prompted a wave of GOP lawmakers to pledge support for a House measure that would call on the Justice Department to release its Epstein files.

title: Trump 'knew about the girls,' Jeffrey Epstein claimed in emails as Democrats, GOP release trove of records
content: Donald Trump 'spent hours at my house' and 'knew about the girls,' Jeffrey Epstein wrote in emails that House Democrats released Wednesday.

title: What's in the explosive Jeffrey Epstein emails accusing Trump? Here is what we know
content: Donald Trump, a longtime friend of Epstein's, has said he fell out with the convicted sex offender before he was elected president and has denied any involvement in wrongdoing.
